Jan. 29, 1888 D Centennial Band Contest
Centennial Band Contest 0 Other
centennial-band-contest
None
Carrington Grounds, Sydney, New South Wales, Australia Opening of Centennial Park Billed as the Greatest Event in the history of Australian Bands featured 7 bands from the Colonies of Victoria, South Australia and Tasmania as well as 5 from New South Wales.
Overall results were determined over a selection ; dance selection and quickstep (all own choice) Opening of Centennial Park Billed as the Greatest Event in the history of Australian Bands featured 7 bands from the Colonies of Victoria, South Australia and Tasmania as well as 5 from New South Wales.
